item.title: R.I.P.D.
item.description: I’ve heard it said that R.I.P.D is essentially Men in Black with undead instead of aliens.Â I can see where they’re coming from, but there’s a decent bit that doesn’t quite match up.

item.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
item.description: It’s hard to count the number of things that went sideways in Jack the Giant Slayer.
